channel.title: git on Ye Zheng's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in git on Ye Zheng's Blog

item.title: Git cheat sheet
item.description: Create Clone an existing repository $ git clone ssh://user@domain.tld/repo.git Clone an existing repository and all its sub-modules recursively $ git clone --recurse-submodules ssh://user@domain.tld/repo.git Create a new local repository $ git init Configuration Set the name attached to all your commits $ git config [--global] user.name <name> Set the email attached to all your commits $ git config [--global] user.email <email> Set colorization of command line output for all repos $ git config [--global] color.
